sentences.en: Thus art works themselves encourage us to view them superficially, without appreciating the richness of detail and labour that is involved.
sentences.cn: 因此，艺术作品本身鼓励我们从表面上看待它们，而不欣赏所涉及的细节和劳动的丰富性。

sentences.en: There's a growing appreciation that superficially similar groups of customers may have very different preferences in terms of what they want to buy and how they want to buy it.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人认识到，表面上相似的顾客群体在他们想买什么和他们想怎么买方面可能有非常不同的偏好。

sentences.en: The film touches on these issues, but only superficially.
sentences.cn: 这部电影触及了这些问题，但很肤浅。
